QuestData.Title: Target: Hive'Zora Waywatchers
QuestData.Description: Reinforcements have been called on to join the assault on Hive'Zora. You have been selected to target Hive'Zora waywatchers. Report back to Commander Mar'alith after completing your task.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 30 Hive'Zora Waywatchers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Combat Task Briefing VI in order to complete this quest.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have something to tell me, $C?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $N. Your part in the attack on Hive'Zora has been noted.
